title: Director Of Secret Service Resigns
teaser: Julia Pierson has resigned amidst a number of recent security lapses.
contentencoded:
Secret Service director Julia Pierson has resigned amidst a number of recent security breaches.

NPR White House correspondent Scott Horsley joins Here & Now‘s Robin Young with the latest.

Guest

  • Scott Horsley, NPR White House correspondent.
